name: Trend Hopper!
description:
---------------------------------------
♡ ABOUT ♡
---------------------------------------

Trend Hopper is a dress-up/rhythm game combo where you use style and dance to befriend the cliques at your school! Inspired by early 2000s flash games for girls, Trend Hopper is made with cheesy nostalgia in mind. 

---------------------------------------

Marcus Sett: Programmer, Animator

Ellia Godbout: Project Manager, Dance Pad Designer, Game Designer, Level Designer, Beat Map Designer, NPC concept designer
